title: Azure + WordPress 403 and 404 Error Specialist
description: I'm looking for an Azure specialist that understands 403 (webpage/resource forbidden) and 404 (http status) Errors. ASP.net Core 3/C-Sharp programmer to initially correct the 403 and 404 Errors. The program is built via: Microsoft Azure as the single comprehensive platform technology solution, utilizing: - App Server for middle-tier - SQL Services for back-end - Storage Account for File share storage - Application Insight for performance and load monitoring Programming: - Backend: MS SQL Server - Client Side: React.JS - Middle Tier: ASP.NET Core 3/C-Sharp - Authentication: OAUTH / OpenID Connect Integration with 3rd party providers: - SendGrid integration for emails exchange and notification - Cronofy integration for calendar synchronization - Twilio integration for text messages Proprietary User Account Management System: - Support for single account with roles within multiple events - SSO (Single Sign-on) with Linked-in - Dual login mode - to the platform (with selection of event) and individual events via event-specific URL - Complete technological audit trail - all user, admin and system action are audited with the ability to query audit and runs BI analysis - Open API for integration with 3rd party systems Hourly compensation at market rates based on experience and/or as negotiated on a feature/project specific basis at Programmers own time.
